question: Which of the following events took place during the viceroyship of Lord Reading?
explanation: Lord Reading (1921 â€“ 1926): The excerpts of the important events took place during his period are:- Rowlatt act was repealed , Prince of Wales visited India in November, 1921, Moplah rebellion (1921) took place in Kerala, 1921, Formation of Swaraj Party, Kakory Train Robbery on August 9, 1925, Chauri-Chaura incident (1922), etc.
